price: (61) [Noah] said, "O my people, there is not error in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي ضَلَٰلَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi laysa bī ḍalālatun walākinnī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
